Text:
FYI: Christmas with Bing album track listing is wrong.  Voice of Christmas album is correct. Here is the list of songs your getting on that album

Christmas with Bing Crosby


Tracklist:

1. White Christmas
2. Adeste Fideles
3. Mele Kalikamaka
4. I'll Be Home For Christmas
5. Happy Holiday
6. Jingle Bells
7. Faith Of Our Fathers
8. Christmas In Killarney
9. Silent Night
10.It's Beginning To Look A Lot Like Christmas
11.God Rest Ye Merry Gentlemen
12.Silver Bells
13.Too-Ra-Loo-Ra-Loo-Ra (That's An Irish Lullaby)
14.Galway Bay
15.Santa Claus Is Comin' To Town

FYI :)
